item.description:
Hello Everybody,

Our group meets once a month on Sundays. December's meeting is on SUNDAY DECEMBER 2nd at 4:00 pm at a DIFFERENT LOCATION. There IS no parking. The new place is in the BACK BAY

PLEASE TAKE THE "T" OVER TO HYNES CONVENTION CENTER. WALK 2 BLOCKS TO MARLBOROUGH ST. MY PLACE IS AT THE CORNER OF MASSACHUSETTS AVENUE.

PLEASE BE ON TIME.

Rules:

PLEASE SAY "YES" ONLY IF YOU ARE SURE
PLEASE ARRIVE 10 MINUTES EARLY. GAMES STARTS ON TIME
WE PLAY WITH 2 TEAMS.
EACH TEAM IS ASSIGNED A COMMENTATOR.
GAME TIME IS 2 HOURS.
AT THE END OF EACH GAME, WE HOLD A COMMENTATOR SESSION FOR 15 MINUTES FOR EACH TEAM.
COMMENTATORS DISCUSS THE RISKS AND REWARDS TAKEN BY EACH TEAM MEMBER

WE DO HAVE A WAITING LIST. THE GAME WILL END AT 7 PM. GAME FEE IS $3 PER PLAYER. GAME FEE IS WAIVED FOR THOSE WHO BRING IN THEIR BOARDS

THANK YOU

EDAN BARSHAN
ORGANIZER
item.name: The Metro Boston Cashflow November Meetup
